#0000ff;">:supportsRtl</span><span style="color: #008000;">="true"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:theme</span><span style="color: #008000;">="@style/Theme.FunixBGService"</span>&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">activity </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">=".MainActivity"</span>&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">intent-filter</span>&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">action </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">="android.intent.action.MAIN" </span>/&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">category </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" </span>/&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">intent-filter</span>&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">activity</span>&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <strong>&lt;<span style="color: #000080;">service </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">=".FunixBGService"</span>/&gt;</strong></span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">application</span>&gt;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">manifest</span>&gt;</span></pre> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Bước 6:</strong> Điều khiển Service trong Activity</span></p> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">package </span>com.techja.funixbgservice;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.content.Intent;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.os.Bundle;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public class </span>MainActivity <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">extends </span>AppCompatActivity {</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">protected void </span>onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">super</span>.onCreate(savedInstanceState);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> setContentView(R.layout.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">activity_main</span>);</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.findViewById(R.id.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">bt_start</span>).setOnClickListener(v -&gt; playSong());</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.findViewById(R.id.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">bt_stop</span>).setOnClickListener(v -&gt; stopSong());</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>playSong() {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">//T</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">o Intent đ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ể</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> chu</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ẩ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">n b</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ị</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> k&iacute;ch ho</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">t Service ph&aacute;t nh</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">c<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>Intent myIntent = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>Intent(MainActivity.<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>, FunixBGService.<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">class</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">//K&iacute;ch ho</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">t service<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.startService(myIntent);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>stopSong() {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">//T</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">o Intent đ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ể</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> chu</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ẩ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">n b</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ị</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> h</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ủ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">y Service ph&aacute;t nh</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">c<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>Intent myIntent = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>Intent(MainActivity.<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>, FunixBGService.<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">class</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">//D</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ừ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ng Service ph&aacute;t nh</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">c<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.stopService(myIntent);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">}</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Chạy chương tr&igrave;nh v&agrave; xem th&agrave;nh quả!</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img margin-top: 20px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Nội dung t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">C&aacute;c t&agrave;i liệu&nbsp;dưới đ&acirc;y&nbsp;gi&uacute;p bạn một lần nữa nắm vững hơn v&agrave; hiểu r&otilde; hơn về Service - component rất quan trọng trong Android m&agrave; bất kỳ lập tr&igrave;nh vi&ecirc;n n&agrave;o cũng cần phải nắm vững. B&ecirc;n cạnh đ&oacute; l&agrave; đối tượng BroadcastReceiver cũng quan trọng kh&ocirc;ng k&eacute;m, khi c&oacute; sự hiểu biết về đối tượng n&agrave;y, ch&uacute;ng ta c&oacute; thể tạo ra c&aacute;c ứng dụng được k&iacute;ch hoạt bởi c&aacute;c Action của hệ thống!&nbsp;</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">Một số vấn đề cốt l&otilde;i cần nắm được trong t&agrave;i liệu:</span></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c dạng Service v&agrave; c&aacute;ch sử dụng</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Định nghĩa về BroadcastReceiver</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c c&aacute;ch sử dụng BroadcastReceiver</span></li> </ul> <p><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Link t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;"><a href="https://developer.android.com/guide/components/services" target="_blank">T&agrave;i liệu đọc: Đối tượng thực thi t&aacute;c vụ ngầm (Service) trong Android</a>&nbsp;(xem bản dịch hỗ trợ <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/19zvHkC-QLviZxuJ39KY7tihzD6jsS2CJ/view" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>)</li> <li style="font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;"><a href="https://developer.android.com/guide/components/broadcasts" target="_blank">T&agrave;i liệu đọc: Đối tượng lắng nghe Action từ hệ thống (Broadcast Receiver)</a>&nbsp;(xem bản dịch hỗ trợ <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MZjnQJ19UuoUJxtqkHsNE1Q8GpO-kbdH/view" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>)</li> </ul> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@7e5fe862659d4433933ccefda2d38303" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Gửi tin nhắn SMS bằng việc sử dụng đối tượng SmsManager</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@7e5fe862659d4433933ccefda2d38303" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@d4892fe249bc482b9cc6972fedc5e832"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@d4892fe249bc482b9cc6972fedc5e832" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">GỬI TIN NHẮN TRONG ANDROID</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Trong Android, về cơ bản c&oacute; 2 c&aacute;ch để bạn gửi một tin nhắn SMS đ&oacute; l&agrave; sử dụng SmsManager v&agrave; Intent.ACTION_SEND.</span></p> <p><strong>1. SmsManager:</strong> Cho ph&eacute;p bạn gửi tin nhắn SMS một c&aacute;ch trực tiếp từ ứng dụng của bạn tới một số điện thoại bất kỳ.</p> <p><strong>2. Intent.ACTION_SEND</strong>: Từ ứng dụng của bạn, bạn c&oacute; thể tạo một Intent kh&ocirc;ng tường minh (implicit Intent) gửi đến hệ thống Android để y&ecirc;u cầu hệ thống gửi tin nhắn gi&uacute;p bạn. Hệ thống sẽ mở ra một ứng dụng gửi SMS tốt nhất sẵn c&oacute; tr&ecirc;n hệ thống để l&agrave;m việc n&agrave;y v&agrave; nhiều khả năng n&oacute; sẽ sử dụng ứng dụng Message.</p> <p>Ứng dụng Message ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; ứng dụng gửi SMS c&oacute; sẵn tr&ecirc;n Android m&agrave; tất cả người d&ugrave;ng đều quen thuộc với n&oacute;.</p> <p><strong>Ch&uacute; &yacute;:&nbsp;</strong>Nếu bạn test c&aacute;c ứng dụng gửi SMS tr&ecirc;n Android Emulator (tr&igrave;nh giả lập Android), bạn cần biết số điện thoại của n&oacute; v&agrave; bạn c&oacute; thể test ứng dụng bằng c&aacute;ch gửi SMS v&agrave;o số điện thoại n&agrave;y.</p> <p>C&aacute;ch lấy số điện thoại của m&aacute;y ảo:</p> <p style="padding-left: 210px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2023.gif?alt=media&amp;token=5863e82f-c5e6-46f9-aa0e-cc85a095caac" alt="File preview" /></p> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">GỬI SMS VỚI SMSMANAGER</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">SmsManager l&agrave; một lớp c&oacute; sẵn trong Android, n&oacute; cho ph&eacute;p bạn gửi trực tiếp một SMS tới một số điện thoại bất kỳ.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Trong v&iacute; dụ sau, ch&uacute;ng ta sẽ gửi tin nhắn SMS tới số điện thoại của ch&iacute;nh thiết bị đang test, v&igrave; vậy ngay sau khi nhấn v&agrave;o n&uacute;t gửi tin nhắn sẽ thấy th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhận được một SMS.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><strong>Ch&uacute; &yacute;:</strong> Nếu người d&ugrave;ng đ&atilde; cho ph&eacute;p ứng dụng gửi tin nhắn SMS, ứng dụng sẽ kh&ocirc;ng cần hỏi lại người d&ugrave;ng trong c&aacute;c lần gửi SMS tiếp theo, v&igrave; vậy đ&ocirc;i khi bạn phải loại bỏ c&aacute;c quyền (permission) đ&atilde; cấp cho ứng dụng để c&oacute; thể test ứng dụng một c&aacute;ch đầy đủ hơn.</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><strong>Bước 1:</strong> Tạo project mới</span></p> <p>Name: SmsManagerExample<br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Package name: org.funix.sms</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Th&ecirc;m một đoạn m&atilde; XML dưới đ&acirc;y v&agrave;o tập tin AndroidManifest.xml để cho ph&eacute;p ứng dụng gửi SMS. Ch&uacute; &yacute;: Với Android 6.0+ (API Level 23+) ứng dụng của bạn cần phải hỏi người d&ugrave;ng để được ph&eacute;p gửi SMS</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Quyền SMS:&nbsp;</span></span><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">&lt;uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SEND_SMS"/&gt;</span></p> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">xml version</span><span style="color: #008000;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #0000ff;">encoding</span><span style="color: #008000;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;<br /></span>&lt;<span style="color: #000080;">manifest </span><span style="color: #0000ff;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #008000;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #0000ff;">package</span><span style="color: #008000;">="org.funix.sms"</span>&gt;<br /> <strong> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">uses-permission </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">="android.permission.SEND_SMS"</span>/&gt;</strong><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">application<br /></span><span style="color: #000080;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:allowBackup</span><span style="color: #008000;">="true"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:icon</span><span style="color: #008000;">="@mipmap/ic_launcher"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:label</span><span style="color: #008000;">="@string/app_name"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:roundIcon</span><span style="color: #008000;">="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:supportsRtl</span><span style="color: #008000;">="true"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:theme</span><span style="color: #008000;">="@style/AppTheme"</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">activity </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">=".MainActivity"</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">intent-filter</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">action </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">="android.intent.action.MAIN" </span>/&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080;">category </span><span style="color: #660e7a;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000;">="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" </span>/&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">intent-filter</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">activity</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">application</span>&gt;<br />&lt;/<span style="color: #000080;">manifest</span>&gt;</pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong>Bước 2:</strong> X&acirc;y dựng nội dung&nbsp;file layout giao diện</p> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">xml version</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">encoding</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;<br /></span>&lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">LinearLayout </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">app</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">tools</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="http://schemas.android.com/tools"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:orientation</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="vertical"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:padding</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="20dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">tools</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:context</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">=".MainActivity"</span>&gt;<br /><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">TextView<br /></span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:id</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="@+id/textView"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="wrap_content"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:text</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="Phone Number"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:textSize</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="20sp" </span>/&gt;<br /><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">EditText<br /></span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:id</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="@+id/editText_phoneNumber"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #008000; th&ocirc;ng số kh&ocirc;ng quan trọng)<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> // text: Nội dung tin nhắn gửi đi<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> // sentIntent, deliveryIntent: L&agrave; 2 tham số để nhận phản hồi khi tin nhắn được gửi th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng đến SĐT người nhận<br /> // (Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; th&ocirc;ng số kh&ocirc;ng quan trọng)<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>smsManager.sendTextMessage(phoneNumber,<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">null</span>,<br /> Toast.<span style="font-style: italic;">makeText</span>(getApplicationContext(), <span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"Tin nhắn đ&atilde; được gửi đi"</span>,<br /> Toast.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">LENGTH_LONG</span>).show();<br /> } <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">catch </span>(Exception ex) {<br /> Log.<span style="font-style: italic;">e</span>(<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">TAG</span>, <span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"Gửi tin nhắn thất bại"</span>, " </span>+ ex.getMessage(),<br /> Toast.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">LENGTH_LONG</span>).show();<br /> ex.printStackTrace();<br /> }<br />}</pre> <pre style="color: #000000; box-sizing: content-box; height: 0px; line-height: 1.4em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" /> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;">H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về việc gửi tin nhắn trong Android!</p> <div style="background-image: url('https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fbackground_Video.jpg?alt=media&amp;token=0ae7f287-f72f-496d-b18f-da9d02798468'); border-radius: 50%; border: 10px solid #FEDE00;" /> <h1 style="font-size: 40px; color: white; margin: 10px; text-align: center;">Gửi tin nhắn SMS bằng việc sử dụng đối tượng SmsManager</h1> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 30px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; text-align: center;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #1f9afe; text-align: center;">Credit:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.udemy.com" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; background: transparent; margin: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Bạn h&atilde;y ch&uacute; &yacute; bật phụ đề tiếng Việt được đ&oacute;ng g&oacute;p bởi FUNiX để hiểu r&otilde; hơn.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@2503ecdb76e24900964312009a70716a" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Exercise 4</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@2503ecdb76e24900964312009a70716a" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@aeb79a28d76b437bad229ca9fe6980eb"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@aeb79a28d76b437bad229ca9fe6980eb" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;">B&agrave;i tập tự luyện:</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Ngo&agrave;i c&aacute;c b&agrave;i tập thực h&agrave;nh bắt buộc, học vi&ecirc;n c&oacute; thể tự luyện tập th&ecirc;m để trau dồi c&aacute;c kiến thức cũng như kỹ năng đ&atilde; được học th&ocirc;ng qua b&agrave;i Exercise.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Trong b&agrave;i Exercise n&agrave;y, học vi&ecirc;n tự luyện th&ocirc;ng qua 2 b&agrave;i tập nhỏ</span></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span color="#009fe6" face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Exercise 4.1 - Lắng nghe sự kiện screen on/off</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span color="#009fe6" face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Exercise 4.2 - Hiện Toast Emoji ngộ nghĩnh khi c&oacute; cuộc gọi đến</span></li> </ul> <p><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;">Mời c&aacute;c bạn học vi&ecirc;n xem chi tiết nội dung của từng b&agrave;i exercise&nbsp;ở c&aacute;c mục dưới đ&acirc;y.</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;">: <strong>6</strong></span><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline;">0 ph&uacute;t</strong></p> </div> </div> <div class="vert vert-1" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@064d272f6b994b8b92722af1310ac005"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@064d272f6b994b8b92722af1310ac005" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><strong><span style="color: #000000; font-size: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-family: inherit;">Exercise 4.1 - Lắng nghe sự kiện screen on/off</span></strong></p> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;"><b>I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</b></span></p> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;"><b>-&nbsp;</b>C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI&nbsp;</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Drawable</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Color Schemes</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">String constants</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Style &amp; themes</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">&nbsp;- C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">TextView, ImageView</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">- C&aacute;c đối tượng logic</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">BroadcastReceiver</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Activity</span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><strong>II. Nội dung b&agrave;i tập</strong></p> <p><strong>1. Y&ecirc;u cầu</strong></p> <p>Tạo 1 ứng dụng Screen Talk v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:</p> <p style="padding-left: 300px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2025.png?alt=media&amp;token=4e5833e4-bd3d-422b-a2c1-03c459ddcbb8" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><strong>M&ocirc; tả:</strong> Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện mặc định, khi tắt m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh điện thoại sẽ ph&aacute;t ra &acirc;m thanh &ldquo;Bye bye&rdquo;, khi m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh được bật s&aacute;ng trở lại, sẽ ph&aacute;t ra &acirc;m thanh &ldquo;Hello&rdquo;.</p> <p><strong>Y&ecirc;u cầu về logic:</strong></p> <p>- Sử dụng BroadcastReceiver để lắng nghe sự kiện người d&ugrave;ng click on-off screen.</p> <p>- Sử dụng MediaPlayer để ph&aacute;t nhạc</p> <p><strong>2. Gợi &yacute;</strong></p> <p>C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng</p> <p>- Download c&aacute;c file nhạc hello.mp3, bye-bye.mp3 ở nguồn sau:&nbsp;</p> <ul> <li><a href="https://www.zedge.net/ringtone/698fb78d-be8b-3838-8f53-2961d100e1ab" target="_blank">Bye-Bye.mp3</a></li> <li><a href="https://www.zedge.net/ringtone/da69d5e2-8842-3390-a1fb-015c68f50d30" target="_blank">Hello.mp3</a></li> </ul> <p><strong>3. Hướng dẫn</strong></p> <ul></ul> <p>Bước 1: Chuẩn bị t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n raw như sau:</p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2026.png?alt=media&amp;token=0f4fe9f2-3aad-4625-9b85-9cbf7ff24642" alt="File preview" /></p> <p>Bước 2: Triển khai code logic trong activity <strong>MainActivity</strong></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes; height: 76.0pt;"> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; height: 76pt;"> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">package </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">com.techja.screentalk;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.content.BroadcastReceiver;<br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.content.Context;<br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.content.Intent;<br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.content.IntentFilter;<br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.media.MediaPlayer;<br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.os.Bundle;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public class </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">MainActivity </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">extends </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">AppCompatActivity {<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">protected void </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">super</span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; setContentView(R.layout.</span><b><i><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">activity_main</span></i></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; initViews();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">try </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">{<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IntentFilter filter = </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">IntentFilter();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; filter.addAction(Intent.</span><b><i><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ACTION_SCREEN_ON</span></i></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; filter.addAction(Intent.</span><b><i><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ACTION_SCREEN_OFF</span></i></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; BroadcastReceiver receiver = </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">BroadcastReceiver() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; doScreenTalk(intent.getAction());<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;registerReceiver(receiver, filter);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">private void </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">doScreenTalk(String action) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">if</span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; sayHello();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; sayGoodbye();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">private void </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, R.raw.</span><b><i><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">).start();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">private void </span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">sayHello() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MediaPlayer.<i>create</i>(</span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, R.raw.</span><b><i><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">song_hello</span></i></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; &nbsp;&nbsp;}<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&nbsp;</span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><strong>4. Lưu &yacute;</strong></p> <p>- Thực thi chương tr&igrave;nh v&agrave; c&agrave;i đặt v&agrave;o trong thiết bị điện thoại</p> <p>- Bật tắt m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh điện thoại để test ứng dụng</p> </div> </div> <div class="vert vert-2" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@c9fad5653b934940b0f652e168c4dabc"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@c9fad5653b934940b0f652e168c4dabc" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><strong><span style="color: #000000; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit;">Exercise 4.2 - Hiện Toast Emoji&nbsp;</span><span style="color: #000000; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit;">ngộ nghĩnh khi c&oacute; cuộc gọi đến</span></strong></p> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;"><b>I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</b></span></p> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;"><b>-&nbsp;</b>C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI&nbsp;</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Drawable</span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">- C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">TextView, ImageView</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:</span><span color="#000000">&nbsp;</span>LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> </ul> <p><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">- C&aacute;c đối tượng logic</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">BroadcastReceiver</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Toast</span></li> <li><span color="#000000" style="color: #000000;">Activity</span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><strong>II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh</strong></p> <p><strong>1. Y&ecirc;u cầu</strong></p> <p>Tạo 1 ứng dụng Screen Talk v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:</p> <p style="padding-left: 270px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2027.png?alt=media&amp;token=adbc517f-3252-4f03-a17e-87c9a5341d69" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><strong>M&ocirc; tả</strong>: Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện mặc định, khi c&oacute; cuộc gọi đến hoặc khi cuộc gọi kết th&uacute;c sẽ hiển thị icon vui nhộn.</p> <p><strong>Y&ecirc;u cầu về logic</strong>:</p> <p>- Sử dụng BroadcastReceiver để lắng nghe sự kiện người d&ugrave;ng click on-off screen.</p> <p>- Sử dụng TelephonyManager lắng nghe trạng th&aacute;i của cuộc gọi</p> <p>- Sử dụng Toast để hiển thị icon ngộ nghĩnh</p> <p><strong>3. Hướng dẫn</strong></p> <p>Bước 1: Chuẩn bị t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n drawable như sau:</p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2028.png?alt=media&amp;token=8ac65613-867e-4241-8550-8fa7c26cb4bc" alt="File preview" /></p> <p>Ảnh <strong>icon ngộ nghĩnh</strong> c&oacute; thể tải ở <a href="https://findicons.com/search/face/2" target="_blank">link tại đ&acirc;y</a>.</p> <p>Bước 2: Triển khai code logic trong class <strong>ServiceReceiver</strong> để lắng nghe cuộc gọi đến</p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt;"> <pre style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">package </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">com.techja.callemoij;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> &lt;/</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin;
