mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<o:p></o:p></span></pre> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">&nbsp;</span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p>Bước 3: Triển khai code logic trong class <strong>MainActivity</strong> để kiểm tra quyền người d&ugrave;ng</p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt;"> <pre style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">if </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(checkSelfPermission(Manifest.permission.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">READ_PHONE_STATE</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">) != PackageManager.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">PERMISSION_GRANTED</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; requestPermissions(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">String[]{<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Manifest.permission.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">READ_PHONE_STATE<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">}, </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue;">101</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></pre> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><strong>4. Lưu &yacute;</strong></p> <p>- Thực thi chương tr&igrave;nh v&agrave; c&agrave;i đặt v&agrave;o trong thiết bị điện thoại</p> <p>- Bật tắt m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh điện thoại để test ứng dụng</p> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@78a78b9a1b8842e8bf4606c55fdff5e6" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 6.1 - Tạo giao diện nghe nhạc</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@78a78b9a1b8842e8bf4606c55fdff5e6" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@ad3eea93b07a4e3c8c0ecb67809d5ef4"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@ad3eea93b07a4e3c8c0ecb67809d5ef4" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Drawable, Color Schemes, String constants, Style &amp; themes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng View System<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView, ImageView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:&nbsp;</span></span>LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> </ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng xử l&yacute; logic<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Activity, MediaPlayer, RecyclerView, Adapter</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">ContentResolver gi&uacute;p truy cập t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n của điện thoại để lấy danh s&aacute;ch nhạc</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng My Music v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="252" valign="top" style="width: 189.0pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2029.png?alt=media&amp;token=293a8f7b-5283-4f15-a716-08107e3a3ffa" alt="File preview" /></td> <td width="371" valign="top" style="width: 278.5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; giao diện hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c b&agrave;i nhạc c&oacute; trong điện thoại của người sử dụng. Khi click v&agrave;o b&agrave;i h&aacute;t, n&oacute; sẽ thực hiện ph&aacute;t nhạc.<o:p></o:p></span></span> <span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Thiết kế đ&uacute;ng như giao diện hiển thị b&ecirc;n tr&aacute;i<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Sử dụng RecyclerView để hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch b&agrave;i h&aacute;t<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Sử dụng bộ icon trong nguồn Vector Assets của AndroidStudio c&oacute; sẵn.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Khai b&aacute;o quyền <b>READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE</b> để c&oacute; thể truy cập bộ nhớ của điện thoại<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">ContentResolver gi&uacute;p truy cập t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n của điện thoại để lấy danh s&aacute;ch nhạc<o:p></o:p></span></span> <span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span> <span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp;</span><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout<o:p></o:p></span></p> <p><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:&nbsp;</span>TextView, ImageView</p> <p><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:&nbsp;</span></p> <ul> <ul> <li>LinearLayout</li> <li><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thẻ include</span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c đối tượng giao diện:&nbsp;</span>RecyclerView, Adapter</p> <p><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c đối tượng logic:&nbsp;</span>Activity</p> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Lấy ảnh icon trong kho ảnh vector assets của Android Studio</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">3. Hướng dẫn</span></b></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><b>A. X&acirc;y dựng giao diện</b></span></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 1:</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> Chuẩn bị t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n <b>drawable, AndroidManifest </b>như sau:</span></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Nội dung file </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">res/values/strings.xml</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt;"> <pre style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&lt;</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">resources</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">string </span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">name</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="app_name"</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;My Music&lt;/</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">string</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">string </span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="vertical"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@7b84fbebeb1e4941be87395489785407" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 6.2 - Xây dựng controller nghe nhạc bằng MediaPlayer</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@7b84fbebeb1e4941be87395489785407" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@2e4c0f509ee94bf1af4b8bb82b900cdb"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@2e4c0f509ee94bf1af4b8bb82b900cdb" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Nối tiếp b&agrave;i lab 6.1</span></li> </ul> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">B.&nbsp;&nbsp;Xử l&yacute; logic<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%207%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2030.png?alt=media&amp;token=6af195e7-84e4-462d-a3ef-c885ab1b4b91" alt="File preview" /></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 1:</span></span></b><b> </b></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">X&acirc;y dựng đối tượng SongEntity để định nghĩa c&aacute;c th&ocirc;ng tin của b&agrave;i h&aacute;t</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="636" style="width: 476.75pt; border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="636" valign="top" style="width: 476.75pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt;"> <pre style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public class </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; color: navy;">private </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">String </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">name</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">SongEntity(String name, String path, String album) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">name </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">path </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">= path;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.setProgress(time);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@SuppressLint</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green;">"SimpleDateFormat"</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">)<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">private </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">String getTime(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">int </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">time) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">return new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">SimpleDateFormat(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green;">"mm:ss"</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">).format(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">Date(time));<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">protected void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onDestroy() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">super</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.onDestroy();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">thread</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.interrupt();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onProgressChanged(SeekBar seekBar, </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">int </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">progress, </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">boolean </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">fromUser) {<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onStartTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) {<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onStopTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">if </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">state </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">== </span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">STATE_PLAYING </span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">|| </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">state </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">== </span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">STATE_PAUSED</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">player</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.seekTo(seekBar.getProgress());<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></pre> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp;</span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 107%;">4. Lưu &yacute;:</span></strong></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; <b>RelativeLayout </b>để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y nh&eacute;.</span><b>&nbsp;</b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng thẻ: <b>android:requestLegacyExternalStorage="true"</b> để cho ph&eacute;p truy cập bộ nhớ của điện thoại đối với c&aacute;c thiết bị c&oacute; version Android SDK&gt;=10</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@7b4aeabcc43046c3a8ecbf617ff96358" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Tổng kết bài học</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@7b4aeabcc43046c3a8ecbf617ff96358" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@9ae4371d813640c7bfcad77877482c48"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@9ae4371d813640c7bfcad77877482c48" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="color: #0000ff;"><span style="color: #000000;">Tổng kết b&agrave;i học:</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></p> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">B&agrave;i học cung cấp cho bạn&nbsp;c&aacute;c kiến thức chuy&ecirc;n s&acirc;u li&ecirc;n quan đến hệ thống như việc gửi tin nhắn đi, thực hiện t&aacute;c vụ ngầm. Cụ thể c&aacute;c kiến thức thu nạp được gồm:</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch ph&acirc;n loại quyền người d&ugrave;ng</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch khai b&aacute;o, y&ecirc;u cầu quyền người d&ugrave;ng cho ứng dụng</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch ph&aacute;t nhạc/video trong Android bằng đối tượng MediaPlayer/VideoView</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c loại Service kh&aacute;c khau v&agrave; c&aacute;ch sử dụng ch&uacute;ng để thực thi c&aacute;c t&aacute;c vụ dưới nền</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch gửi tin nhắn đi bằng SmsManager</span></li> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Một số t&agrave;i liệu để sinh vi&ecirc;n tham khảo th&ecirc;m:</span></p> <ul> <li><a href="https://viblo.asia/p/broadcastreceiver-trong-android-XqaGEmgRGWK" target="[object Object]">Lắng nghe tin nhắn đến bằng BroadcastReceiver</a></li> <li><a href="https://openplanning.net/10487/android-videoview" target="[object Object]">Ph&aacute;t video bằng VideoView</a></li> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh đọc t&agrave;i liệu c&oacute; bất cứ c&acirc;u hỏi n&agrave;o h&atilde;y kết nối với mentor.</span></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; " data-graded="True"> </div> </div> </div> <div class="vert vert-4" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@e9d44a64acb1977a057f"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-problem xmodule_display xmodule_CapaModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="problem" data-request-token="930889a4297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@e9d44a64acb1977a057f" data-type="Problem" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "Problem"} </script> <div id="problem_e9d44a64acb1977a057f" class="problems-wrapper" role="group" aria-labelledby="e9d44a64acb1977a057f-problem-title" data-problem-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@e9d44a64acb1977a057f" data-url="/courses/course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7/xblock/block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@e9d44a64acb1977a057f/handler/xmodule_handler" data-problem-score="1" data-problem-total-possible="1" data-attempts-used="1" data-content=" &lt;h3 class=&#34;hd hd-3 problem-header&#34; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-progress&#34; id=&#34;block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@e9d44a64acb1977a057f-problem-progress&#34;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem&#34;&gt; value=&#34;choice_3&#34;/&gt; onDestroy() &lt;/label&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;span id=&#34;answer_e9d44a64acb1977a057f_2_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;/fieldset&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;indicator-container&#34;&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;action&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;hidden&#34; name=&#34;problem_id&#34; value=&#34;A184&#34; /&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-hint&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification problem-hint notification-hint is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-question&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;e9d44a64acb1977a057f-problem-title&#34;&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn hint-button&#34;&gt; Next Hint &lt;/button&gt; &gt; &lt;span class=&#34;submit-label&#34;&gt;Submit&lt;/span&gt; &lt;/button&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;submission-feedback&#34; id=&#34;submission_feedback_e9d44a64acb1977a057f&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;Some problems have options such as save, reset, hints, or show answer. &lt;div class=&#34;notification general notification-show-answer is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-info-circle&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;e9d44a64acb1977a057f-problem-title&#34;&gt;Answers are displayed within the problem &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; " data-graded="True"> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

Lab 6.1 - Tạo giao diện nghe nhạc

I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng

  • Các kiến thức căn bản về Design UI
      • Drawable, Color Schemes, String constants, Style & themes
      • Layout constraint rules (padding, margin…)
  • Các đối tượng View System
      • TextView, ImageView
      • Các ViewGroup gồm: LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow
  • Các đối tượng xử lý logic
      • Activity, MediaPlayer, RecyclerView, Adapter
      • ContentResolver giúp truy cập tài nguyên của điện thoại để lấy danh sách nhạc

II. Nội dung bài thực hành

1. Yêu cầu: Tạo 1 ứng dụng My Music và xây dựng giao diện layout sau:

Mô tả: Đây là giao diện hiển thị danh sách các bài nhạc có trong điện thoại của người sử dụng. Khi click vào bài hát, nó sẽ thực hiện phát nhạc.  

Yêu cầu:

-  Thiết kế đúng như giao diện hiển thị bên trái

-  Sử dụng RecyclerView để hiển thị danh sách bài hát

-   Sử dụng bộ icon trong nguồn Vector Assets của AndroidStudio có sẵn.

-   Khai báo quyền READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE để có thể truy cập bộ nhớ của điện thoại

-   ContentResolver giúp truy cập tài nguyên của điện thoại để lấy danh sách nhạc    

 2. Gợi ý: Các kiến thức sử dụng

-  Tạo 1 layout xml trong thư mục res/layout

-   Sử dụng các ViewSystem: TextView, ImageView

-  Sử dụng các ViewGroup: 

    • LinearLayout
    • Thẻ include

-  Sử dụng các đối tượng giao diện: RecyclerView, Adapter

-  Sử dụng các đối tượng logic: Activity

-  Lấy ảnh icon trong kho ảnh vector assets của Android Studio

3. Hướng dẫn

A. Xây dựng giao diện

Bước 1: Chuẩn bị tài nguyên drawable, AndroidManifest như sau:

Nội dung file res/values/strings.xml

<resources>

    <string name="app_name">My Music</string>

    <string name="txt_alert">Hãy cấp quyền truy cập để lấy ds bài hát</string>

</resources>

 Nội dung file AndroidManifest.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

  <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"

    package="com.techja.mymusic">

    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>

  

    <application

        android:requestLegacyExternalStorage="true"

        android:allowBackup="true"

        android:icon="@drawable/ic_launcher"

        android:label="@string/app_name"

        android:supportsRtl="true"

        android:theme="@style/Theme.MyMusic"

        tools:ignore="AllowBackup">

        <activity android:name=".MainActivity">

            <intent-filter>

                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />

            </intent-filter>

        </activity>

    </application>

</manifest>
 

 Bước 2: Tạo file res/layout/item_song.xml có nội dung sau:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

  <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"

    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"

    android:layout_width="match_parent"

    android:layout_height="wrap_content"

    android:orientation="vertical">

  

    <TableRow

        android:id="@+id/tr_song"

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

        android:gravity="center_vertical"

        android:padding="10dp">

  

        <ImageView

            android:layout_width="50dp"

            android:layout_height="50dp"

            android:padding="10dp"

            android:src="@drawable/ic_music"

            app:tint="@color/design_default_color_primary_dark"

            tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />

  

        <TextView

            android:id="@+id/tv_song"

            android:layout_width="match_parent"

            android:layout_height="match_parent"

            android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"

            android:gravity="center_vertical"

            android:text="Câu hẹn câu thề"

            android:textColor="@color/design_default_color_primary_dark"

            android:textSize="18sp" />

    </TableRow>

  

    <View

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="0.5dp"

        android:background="#E5E5E5" />

</LinearLayout>

 Bước 3: Tạo file res/layout/item_controller.xml có nội dung sau:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

  <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"

    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"

    android:layout_width="match_parent"

    android:layout_height="wrap_content"

    android:background="@color/design_default_color_primary_dark"

    android:orientation="vertical"

    android:padding="10dp">

  

    <TextView

        android:id="@+id/tv_name"

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

        android:fontFamily="sans-serif"

        android:text="Câu hẹn câu thề"

        android:textColor="@color/white"

        android:textSize="18sp" />

  

    <TableRow

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

        android:gravity="center_vertical">

  

        <TextView

            android:id="@+id/tv_album"

            android:layout_width="wrap_content"

            android:layout_height="wrap_content"

            android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"

            android:text="Vol.4 - Đình Dũng"

            android:textColor="@color/white"

            android:textSize="12sp" />

  

        <TextView

            android:id="@+id/tv_time"

            android:layout_width="match_parent"

            android:layout_height="wrap_content"

            android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"

            android:gravity="end"

            android:text="00:00/04:35"

            android:textColor="@color/white"

            android:textSize="14sp" />

  

    </TableRow>

  

    <SeekBar

        android:id="@+id/seekbar"

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

        android:layout_marginTop="10dp"

        android:foregroundTint="@color/white"

        android:max="100"

        android:padding="0dp"

        android:progress="50"

        android:progressBackgroundTint="@color/white"

        android:progressTint="@color/white"

        android:thumbTint="@color/white" />

  

    <TableRow

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="50dp"

        android:layout_marginTop="10dp">

  

        <ImageView

            android:id="@+id/iv_back"

            android:layout_width="0dp"

            android:layout_height="match_parent"

            android:layout_weight="1"

            android:padding="10dp"

            android:rotation="180"

            android:src="@drawable/ic_next"

            app:tint="@color/white"

            tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />

  

        <ImageView

            android:id="@+id/iv_play"

            android:layout_width="0dp"

            android:layout_height="match_parent"

            android:layout_weight="1"

            android:src="@drawable/bg_play"

            app:tint="@color/yellow"

            tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />

  

        <ImageView

            android:id="@+id/iv_next"

            android:layout_width="0dp"

            android:layout_height="match_parent"

            android:layout_weight="1"

            android:padding="10dp"

            android:src="@drawable/ic_next"

            app:tint="@color/white"

            tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />

    </TableRow>

</LinearLayout>

Bước 4: Tạo file res/layout/activity_main.xml có nôi dung sau:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

  <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"

    android:layout_width="match_parent"

    android:layout_height="match_parent"

    android:background="@color/white"

    android:orientation="vertical"

    tools:context=".MainActivity">

  

    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView

        android:id="@+id/rv_song"

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_height="0dp"

        android:layout_weight="1"

        tools:listitem="@layout/item_song" />

  

    <include layout="@layout/item_controller" />

</LinearLayout>


Thời gian dự kiến hoàn thành bài này: 30 phút

Lưu ý: Bạn hãy lưu kết quả lab trên máy tính cá nhân để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau này. Lưu ý Học viên cần hoàn thành tất cả các bài lab của môn học mới tiến hành đăng ký review.

Lỗi kỹ thuật

Giải thích lỗi

Ảnh chụp lỗi

File ảnh: jpg,jpeg,png. Kích thước tối đa 5MB

Lỗi nội dung

Giải thích lỗi

Ảnh chụp lỗi

File ảnh: jpg,jpeg,png. Kích thước tối đa 5MB

Lỗi Quiz

Giải thích lỗi

Ảnh chụp lỗi

File ảnh: jpg,jpeg,png. Kích thước tối đa 5MB

Lỗi Ask Mentors

Trường hợp bạn gặp vấn đề với chức năng hỏi đáp mentor, vui lòng xem hướng dẫn dưới để xử lý:

A. Trường hợp đã gửi câu hỏi nhưng không tìm được mentor

  1. Vui lòng thử lại sau vài phút, hoặc thử vào giờ trực chính từ 8h-23h. Nếu không được, hãy sang bước 2.
  2. Nhắn hannah phụ trách để được hỗ trợ

B. Trường hợp không thấy mục Ask Mentors hoặc không thấy hiện ra đầy đủ nội dung nhập câu hỏi

  1. Vui lòng nhấn F5 sau vài phút. Nếu không được, hãy sang bước 2
  2. Nhắn hannah phụ trách để được hỗ trợ

Ask Mentors

Question now Hang your Question
